title: My friend needs help buying a rune page
body:
Asked me for it and I can't find it in the store anymore.

You literally have to go through runes and select all to get it to appear.

Really a huge hassle.

replies.body: It is known, fix in progress, sorry for the inconvenience!

I try it selected all but did not appear for rune. I want to buy new rune n why we still have a limited of masteries 20 pages ? Each champions have a unique Rune and mysteries .  overall we have about 133 champions. 2 pages runes and 20 pages of masteries is not enough. i hope riot , LOL add a setting of each champ where u can have 5 different masteries  and runes why 5 "top, mid n bot, sup n jg "
